snippet: Some contribute the slide to a decline in the overall quality of English clubs, while others say the English clubs are hurt by the depth of the Premier League and the difficulty of playing in it.
abstract: European Champions League is nearing the end of its first knockout stage and English soccer teams are on the verge of not moving beyond the Round of 16; some contribute the slide to a decline in the overall quality of English clubs, while others say the English clubs are hurt by the depth of the Premier League and the difficulty of playing in it.
lead_paragraph: Some contribute the slide to a decline in the overall quality of English clubs, while others say the English clubs are hurt by the depth of the Premier League and the difficulty of playing in it.

headline.main: British Fret About Anemic Results in Champions League
headline.print_headline: British Fret About a Rising Europe
